text: Ma Mère (My Mother in French) is a 2004 drama movie focusing on mother-son incest. This drama was rated NC-17 in the United States. It received mixed although largely negative review by the critics. ==Other websites== * * Category:2004 drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Austrian drama movies Category:Portuguese movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:French-language movies Category:Incest in movies Category:Movies directed by Christophe Honoré
title: Ma Mère
